==Chinese==
{{zh-forms}}

===Etymology===
Literally: a frog at the bottom of a well (who can only see a small part of the sky through the opening)
* ''c.'' '''370 to 301 {{B.C.E.}}:''', [[w:Zhuangzi|Zhuangzi]], ''[[:zh:s:莊子/秋水]]''
*: '''井鼃'''[[不]][[可]][[以]][[語]][[於]][[海]][[者]]，[[拘]][[於]][[虛]][[也]]。
*:: ''A '''frog in a well''' would not be able to put into words (the idea) of an ocean. (To the frog, the concept is) confined to the abstract.''

Note: [[鼃]] is an ancient character for frog. In modern times, it has been replaced with [[蛙]].

===Idiom===
{{zh-idiom}}

# a person of very limited outlook and experience
#* ''c.'' '''1330 - 1400:''' [[w:Luo Guanzhong|Luo Guanzhong]], ''[[w:Romance of the Three Kingdoms|Romance of the Three Kingdoms]], Chapter 113'' ([[:zh:s:三國演義/第113回|三國演義/第113回]])
#*: [[汝]][[乃]]'''井底之蛙'''，[[安]][[知]][[玄奧]][[乎]]！
#*:: ''You're (like) a '''frog at the bottom of a well (who can only see part of the sky)''', how would you know about anything that is profound!''
#* '''1784:''' [[w:Cao Xueqin|Cao Xueqin]], ''[[w:Dream of the Red Chamber|Dream of the Red Chamber]], Chapter 49'' ([[:zh:s:紅樓夢/第049回|紅樓夢/第049回]])
#*: [[可]][[知]][[我]]'''井底之蛙'''，[[成]][[日]][[家]][[只]][[說]][[現在]][[的]][[這]][[幾個]][[人]][[是]][[有一無二]][[的]]。 (''[[Traditional Chinese|trad.]]'')
#*: [[可]][[知]][[我]]'''井底之蛙'''，[[成]][[日]][[家]][[只]][[说]][[现在]][[的]][[这]][[几个]][[人]][[是]][[有一无二]][[的]]。 (''[[Simplified Chinese|simp.]]'')
#*:: ''You can tell that I am a '''frog at the bottom of a well'''. All day long, we just talk about how these few people are so unique.''
